post.author: Brendan
post.content:
Contact: Marshall Berenbaum
Phone: Office: 416.642.6798 X 3110 | Cell: 647.290.0420
---------
Job Title:         Java Web Developer -contractor
Location:         Toronto -downtown, Ontario, Canada
Posted:         4/30/2008
Expires:         6/30/2008
Starting:         ASAP
Type:         Contract
Travel:         N/A
Dress Code:         Casual

Job Description:

• Design, model, develop, test and implement J2EE and Oracle and web-based applications following and utilizing industry accepted methodologies.
• Produce design specifications for projects of various sizes from functional requirements.
• Confer with business analysts or users to resolve questions of intent, output requirements, data acquisition, testing, etc.
• Analyze, review and rewrite programs to increase operating efficiency and/or adapts programs to new requirements.
• Creates the integration test plan and sample input data for unit/integration tests.
• Perform integration tests which may include: stress tests, load tests, performance tests, negative tests; collects and analyzes test results; prepares reports to summarize results of integration tests.
• Prepare software packages for deployment and ensure that they adhere to the defined standard footprint and standard deployment descriptors.
• Provide second level on-call application support.
• Create design documents for implemented solutions.
• Build reusable component APIs and endorse reusability at design and application development levels.
• Work independently and promote team productivity.
• Thoroughly engineer and implement innovations within limits of available tool sets.
• Ensure that company established standards are followed. Comply with mandated policies and procedures and contribute in their improvements.

Must Have Skills:

• Applicable University Degree or equivalent experience in software development.
• IT experience (over 5 years) developing Java and web-based applications using SQL, PL/SQL, Oracle packages.
• Possess at least 2 years of object oriented design and development and at least 1 year of development using Oracle objects.
• Excellent understanding of key architecture considerations/issues associated with distributed multi-tier infrastructure such as: OO design and development framework, design patterns, WebServices, XML, HTML, and SOAP.
• Experience with Java technologies: J2SE, J2EE, EJB, JDBC, Servlets, JNDI, JMS, design patterns and web services.
• Strong command of SQL, PL/SQL and Unix shell scripting required.
• Ability to multitask, work within a dynamic, fast paced environment and ability to meet deadlines required.
• Strong communication (oral and written), analytical skills, and time management skills.
• Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills required.
• Adaptable, flexible, reliable, dedicated, innovative personality.
• Knowledge of Eclipse, ANT and BEA WebLogic Server is a plus.
• Telecommunications industry experience would be a great asset.

Nice to Have Skills:

Team lead experience
post.title: Java Web Developer -contractor
